content: Feng Luo's Homepage Home Research Teaching Publications Group Service Latest News Dr. Feiyan Cai join the group as research assistant professor Nov. 15st, 2023 Three papers get accepted by Nature Communications this year. August 12nd, 2023 Contact Office: 207 McAdams Hall Email: luofeng AT clemson.edu Welcome to Feng Luo's Homepage I am the Marvin J. Pinson, Jr. 46 Distinguished professor of School of Computing, Clemson University and the founding director of Clemson AI Research Institute for Science and Engineering (AIRISE). I received my PhD degree in computer science from University of Texas at Dallas, August 2004. I was a Post-doctorial senior research associate at Department of Pathology of University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center at Dallas and joined Clemson in 2006. I am a senior member of IEEE and a member of ACM. See my up-to-date Curriculum Vitae and Google Scholar. Note: I only communicate with students using my clemson official email only. if someone use a faked gmail contact you, please ignore. It is a phishing email.
